channel.title: Server freezes on black screen while loading?
channel.description:
Well I restarted my server and it starts to load when you log in, except you get stuck on a black screen. I tried my server backup files which have an error. This is what it says: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/zje0io.jpg[/img]
Any help?
